page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: Most people work over the county boundary in Humberside. Not many people work in Holton-le-Clay. There are 11 shops.{Two newsagents employ {boys and girls}to deliver papers. A computer is used to print out papers required each day and the papers each boy or girl delivers. A small super-market - Tates employ about{7 {people.}Two garages employ several people. Nickersons employ{50 people}to pack seeds for farmers and in the offices. There are 5 farms employing about{12 men.}In the village there are 2 nurseries. The 2 schools employ{20 {people,}teachers and caretakers. The council also employs some men to work on the roads and empty our dustbins. There is a wine shop in the village. It employs about{3 people.
